extensionDescription.message: Facebook Container yerujech'uj ri taq asamaj richin Facebook chi kiwa ri ajk'amaya'l asamaj richin nichajïx chi ri Facebook man kerojqaj toq man k'o ta ri Facebook pa ajk'amaya'l ruxaq rik'in taq kikuki aj rox winäq.
extensionDescription.description: Description of the extension. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Facebook Container".

in-fbc-subhead.description: This is shown at the top of the panel pop-up when the user is on a Facebook website, which has been automatically opened into Facebook Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Facebook Container".

in-fbc-p1.message: Wakami ri Facebook nitikïr yatrojqaj pa re ruxaq re'. Richin nayüj re ruxaq re' pa Facebook Container, tacha' Taq Ruxaq Ya'on Q'ij Chi Ke Pa Facebook Container richin nayüj el pa ri rucholajem.

on-facebook-subhead.message: Pa Facebook chuqa' Taq Ruxaq pa Ruk'ulb'a't Facebook Container
on-facebook-subhead.description: This is shown at the top of the panel pop-up when the user is on a Facebook website, which has been automatically opened into Facebook Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Facebook Container".

on-facebook-p1.message: Re wachib'äl re' k'o pa ri kikajtz'ik rochochib'al Firefox toq ye'atz'ët taq ruxaq Facebook o e'atz'aqatisan pa Facebook Container.
on-facebook-p1.description: This is shown in the body of the panel pop-up when the user is on a Facebook website, which has been automatically opened into Facebook Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Facebook Container".

on-facebook-p2.message: Re taq ruxaq re' nik'atzin chi ke ye'ok pa ri ab'anikil richin Facebook (o nrajo' nretamaj at achike rat) richin nitikïr nisamäj. Ri nuq'ajuj chuqa' chi ri Facebook nitikïr nrojqaj ronojel ri nab'än pa ri taq ruxaq ri'.
on-facebook-p2.description: This is shown in the body of the panel pop up when the user is on Facebook.

notOnFacebookHeader.message: Man k'o ta ri $URL$ pa Facebook Container.
notOnFacebookHeader.description: This is shown at the top of the panel pop-up when the user is NOT on a Facebook website, which has been automatically opened OUTSIDE Facebook Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Facebook Container".

notOnFacebookText.message: Man k'o ta pa Facebook Container re ruxaq re'. Re re' nub'än k'ayew chuwäch ri Facebook richin nrojqaj pa ri ajk'amaya'l.
notOnFacebookText.description: This is shown in the body of the panel pop-up when the user is NOT on a Facebook website, which has been automatically opened OUTSIDE Facebook Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Facebook Container".

onUnknownSiteHeader.message: Man k'o ta pa Facebook Container re ruxaq re'.
onUnknownSiteHeader.description: This is shown at the top of the panel pop-up when the user is on an "unknown" website - e.g., about:newtab. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Facebook Container".

facebookContainer.description: This is the name of the extension, and appears at the top of all onboarding panels. Please do not translate "Facebook Container".

onboarding1-subhead.description: This is the subhead of onboarding panel 1. Please do not translate "Facebook Container"

onboarding1-p1.message: Facebook nitikïr nrojqaj ri awokem pa k'amaya'l näq chuwäch ri Facebook.com. Achi'el ri taq ütz chuqa' komon rupitz'b'al Facebook yetikïr nikojqaj akuchi' xak'oje' wi, achi'el — taq ruxaq ri majub'ey xtakomonij.
onboarding1-p1.description: This is the first paragraph of onboarding panel 1. Please do not translate "Facebook Container"

onboarding1-p2.message: Facebook Container nuya' jun kikojol taq ruxaq Facebook chuqa' ri ch'aqa' chik e k'o pa ajk'amaya'l, ruma ri toq ri Facebook k'ayew xtub'än chuwäch xkatrojqaj pa k'amab'ey.

onboarding2-subhead.message: Pa Facebook chuqa' Taq Ruxaq pa Ruk'ulb'a't Facebook Container
onboarding2-subhead.description: This is the subhead for the second onboarding panel. Please do not translate "Facebook Container"

onboarding2-alt.description: This is alternative text for the icon in the second onboarding panel

onboarding2-p1.message: Re wachib'äl re' niwachin pa rukajtz'ik rochochib'al Firefox toq natz'ët jun ajk'amaya'l ruxaq, achi'el Facebook.com, ri k'o pa ruk'ulb'a't ri Facebook Container.
onboarding2-p1.description: This is the first paragraph of the second onboarding panel.

onboarding2-p2.message: Re taq ruxaq re' nik'atzin chi ke ye'ok pa ri ab'anikil pa Facebook (o nrajo' nretamaj at achike rat) richin nitikïr nisamäj. Ri nuq'ajuj chuqa' chi ri Facebook nitikïr nrojqaj ronojel ri nab'än pa ri taq ruxaq ri'.
onboarding2-p2.description: This is the second paragraph of the second onboarding panel. Please do not translate "Facebook Container"

onboarding4-subhead.description: This is the subhead for the fourth onboarding panel.

onboarding4-p1.message: Estape' man at k'o ta pa Facebook, Facebook nitikïr yatrojqaj pa k'amab'ey. Ri taq pitz'b'äl nikiya' q'ij chawe richin nawelesaj rutzijol jun wachinäq pa Facebook o ri yatkokisaj pa ajk'amaya'l ruxaq k'amaya'l akuchi' nawokisaj ri rub'i' ataqoya'l richin Facebook kik'wan ojqanela'. Facebook Container xkeruq'ät ri taq ojqanela' ri' chuqa' xtuk'üt chawäch ri ruwachib'al kokal richin nuya' rutzijol chawe ri taq ojqanela' xeyuj el.
onboarding4-p1.description: This is the first paragraph of the fourth onboarding panel.

onboarding4-img.message: Re wachib'äl re' nuk'üt chawäch achike rub'eyal xtiwachin ri ruwachib'äl rukokal Facebook Containers pa jun ruxaq chuchi' ri pitz'b'äl "Ütz" richin Facebook.
onboarding4-img.description: This is alternative text for the image shown in the fourth onboarding panel.

onboarding5-subhead.message: Titikirisäx molojri'ïl rik'in Facebook pa Ch'aqa' chik taq Ruxaq
onboarding5-subhead.description: This is the subhead for the fifth onboarding panel.

onboarding5-p1.message: Richin nawokisaj ri rutikirib'al amolojri'ïl richin Facebook pa ch'aqa' chik ajk'amaya'l ruxaq, k'o chi ye'asiloj qa chupam ri k'wayöl. Tapitz'a' pa ruwi' ri ruwachib'al kokal richin nacha' ‘Tiya' Q'ij chi ke Ajk'amaya'l Ruxaq pa Facebook Container’ chuxe' qa.
onboarding5-p1.description: This is the first paragraph of the fifth onboarding panel.

onboarding5-img.message: Re wachib'äl re' nuk'üt achike rub'eyal xtiwachin ri pitz'b'äl richin nitz'aqatisäx jun ajk'amaya'l ruxaq pa Facebook Container pa ri pas.
onboarding5-img.description: This is alternative text for the image shown in the fifth onboarding panel.

onboarding5-p2.message: Re re' nuya' q'ij chawe natikirisaj molojri'ïl rik'in Facebook, po nuya' q'ij chi re ri Facebook nrojqaj ri asamaj pa ri ajk'amaya'l ruxaq ri'.
onboarding5-p2.description: This is the second paragraph on the fifth onboarding panel.

btn-allow.description: This is a button to allows users to whitelist the domain, adding it to the Facebook container.

btn-cancel.description: This is a button to cancel out of the onboarding panel.

btn-next.description: This is a button to continue to the next onboarding panel.

btn-back.description: This is a button that returns the user to the previous onboarding panel.

btn-done.description: This is a button the user clicks to close out the panel when they have finished reading the text.

btn-arrow-back.message: Titzolin pa ri jun kan pas.
btn-arrow-back.description: This is alternative text for the back arrow button.

btn-arrow-forward.message: Tib'e pa Achike Rub'eyal Nisamäj ri Facebook Container
btn-arrow-forward.description: This is alternative text for the arrow icon next to the "How Facebook Container Works" link

no-trackers-p1.message: Majun rojqanel Facebook xrïl ri Facebook Container pa re ruxaq re'. Xa xe chi rik'in jub'a' ri ruxaq ruk'wan juley chik ruwäch taq ojqanela'.

learn-more.description: This is a link that opens a page with more information about Facebook Container.

how-fbc-works.message: Achike Rub'eyal Nisamäj ri Facebook Container
how-fbc-works.description: This is a button that opens the Facebook Container onboarding flow.

trackers-detected-subhead.description: This is a subhead, and it means that the add on has protected the user by blocking Facebook trackers.

trackers-detected-p1.message: Ri taq rupitz'b'äl Facebook e k'o pa taq loq'oj, taq rutzijol chuqa' ch'aqa' chik ruxaq kik'wan ojqanela' ri nikitzijoj chi re ri Facebook akuchi' xak'oje' wi pan ajk'amaya'l. Estape' majub'ey e'awokisan ri taq rupitz'b'al Ütz o Komonin, k'a yetikïr nikimöl taq tzij ri ojqanela' chi rij ri awokem pa k'amaya'l. Ri Facebook Container yeruq'ät re taq ojqanela' re'.

trackers-detected-p2.message: Facebook Container yeruq'ät re taq ojqanela' re'. Xa xe we napïtz pa xab'achike pitz'b'äl re', ri Facebook xtitikïr xkatrojqaj.

trackers-detected-fence-alt.description: This is alternative text describing the container fence icon.

sites-added-subhead.message: Taq Ruxaq Ya'on Q'ij pa Facebook Container

sites-included.description: This is a header for the list of websites that are in the Facebook Container by default. Capitalized letters are preferred if that makes sense/is feasible for the language.

no-sites-added.description: This message is shown beneath the 'SITES YOU’VE ALLOWED' list header when no sites have been added to the contaner.

sites-allowed.message: RI TAQ RUXAQ YA'ON Q'IJ CHI KE
sites-allowed.description: This is the header for the list of sites the user has manually added into the Facebook Container. Capitalized letters are preferred if that makes sense/is feasible for the lanaguage.

sites-added-p1.message: Facebook Container numöl kichi' ri taq ruxaq Facebook. Yatikïr namöl kichi' ch'aqa' chik taq ruxaq, xa xe chi xtuya' q'ij chi re ri Facebook nrojqaj ri ajk'amaya'l awokem.

button-allow-site.message: Tiya' q'ij chi ke taq Ruxaq K'amaya'l pa Facebook Container
button-allow-site.description: Button text that allows sites to be added to the Facebook Container

button-remove-site.message: Nawelesaj ri ruxaq pa Facebook Container
button-remove-site.description: Button text that removes an already-added site from the Facebook Container to the default container

button-remove-site-tooltip.message: Ruma chi re ruxaq k'amaya'l re' richin ri Facebook, man tikirel ta niyuj el chupam ri Facebook Container.
button-remove-site-tooltip.description: Tooltip that is displayed when hovering over the remove site button

remove-site-subhead.message: ¿La nawelesaj ri ruxaq pa Facebook Container?

remove-site-p1.message: Toq nayüj re ruxaq k'amaya'l pa ri Facebook Container, man xtisamäj ta chik ri samaj Titikirisäx molojri'ïl rik'in Facebook chuqa' xkeyuj el ri ojqanel taq kuki richin Facebook.

remove-site-p2.message: We nawajo' chik nawokisaj chik Titikirisäx molojri'ïl rik'in Facebook, k'o chi natz'aqatisaj chik pa Facebook Container.

add-site-subhead.message: ¿La niya' q'ij chi nojqan ri Facebook pa re Ruxaq K'amaya'l re'?

add-site-p1.message: Re re' nuya' q'ij chawe natikirisaj molojri'ïl rik'in Facebook, po nuya' q'ij chi re ri Facebook nrojqaj ri asamaj pa re ajk'amaya'l ruxaq re'.

inPageUI-tooltip-button-share.message: Facebook Container xuchüp re pitz'b'äl re' chuqa' xuq'ät ri Facebook richin man trojqaj ri awokem pa re ruxaq re'.

inPageUI-tooltip-button-login.message: Facebook Container xeruq'ät ri rojqanela' Facebook. We nawokisaj Titikirisäx molojri'ïl rik'in Facebook pa re ruxaq k'amaya'l re', ri Facebook xtitikïr xkajrojqaj.

inPageUI-tooltip-prompt-p1.message: ¿La nya' q'ij richin yatrojqaj wawe' ri Facebook?

inPageUI-tooltip-prompt-p2.message: We nawajo' nawokisaj natikirisaj molojri'ïl rik'in Facebook, ri Facebook xtitikïr xtrojqaj ri asamaj pa re ruxaq k'amaya'l re'. Re re' nuto' richin nunük' jun tz'aqät wachib'äl chi rij ri ak'aslem pa k'amab'ey.

inPageUI-tooltip-button-share-passive.message: We napïtz' pa re pitz'b'äl, ri Facebook xtitikïr xrojqaj ri awokem pa re ruxaq k'amaya'l re'.
